'''''Tolkien Journal'' (Vol.2, No.1)''' is an issue of the ''[[Tolkien Journal]]''. The issue features a cover illustration by Ann Kruger.

"Poetry Contest" on page 8 includes the poem ''[[A Elbereth Gilthoniel]]'' with an English translation by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
